LanguageData.AstraMiliatrumMod_ArmourPatch.label: Нашивка на броню Астра Милитарум
LanguageData.AstraMiliatrumMod_ArmourPatch.tooltip: Removes the Astra Militarum versions of dupped Armour when active
LanguageData.AstraMiliatrumMod_WeaponsPatch.label: Наклейка на оружие Астра Милитарум
LanguageData.AstraMiliatrumMod_WeaponsPatch.tooltip: Removes the Astra Militarum versions of dupped Weapons when active
LanguageData.AstraMiliatrumPrimarchMod_SwapComponentT: Replace some of the materials required in recipes with those from the Astra Militarum or Legiones Astartes mods if present.
LanguageData.Vanillia_ExpandFaction_PawnKinds.label: Vanilia Pirate Expansion
LanguageData.Vanillia_ExpandFaction_PawnKinds.tooltip: Adds Pawnkinds with access to imperial and chaos weaponry to the Pirate Faction.
